pageContext.claim: “It is shameful that House Democrats won't take a stronger stand against Anti-Semitism in their conference. Anti-Semitism has fueled atrocities throughout history and it’s inconceivable they will not act to condemn it!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump condemns the Democrats for not taking a stronger stance against one of its members for remarks considered anti-Semitic. But Trump himself has a history of appearing to condone anti-Jewish hatred, if not encouraging it, especially during his presidential campaign. The Times of Israel documented many examples before his election.
